mapper.select: select id, user_id, transaction_id, amount, dateline_create, dateline_end, status from nxt_commission_transfer_in where id = #{id}
select id, user_id, transaction_id, amount, dateline_create, dateline_end, status from nxt_commission_transfer_in limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into nxt_commission_transfer_in(user_id, transaction_id, amount, dateline_create, dateline_end, status) values (#{userId}, #{transactionId}, #{amount}, #{datelineCreate}, #{datelineEnd}, #{status})

insert into nxt_commission_transfer_in(user_id, transaction_id, amount, dateline_create, dateline_end, status) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.transactionId}, #{entity.amount}, #{entity.datelineCreate}, #{entity.datelineEnd}, #{entity.status})

insert into nxt_commission_transfer_in(user_id, transaction_id, amount, dateline_create, dateline_end, status) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.transactionId}, #{entity.amount}, #{entity.datelineCreate}, #{entity.datelineEnd}, #{entity.status})
on duplicate key update user_id = values(user_id) , transaction_id = values(transaction_id) , amount = values(amount) , dateline_create = values(dateline_create) , dateline_end = values(dateline_end) , status = values(status)
mapper.update:
update nxt_commission_transfer_in
user_id = #{userId},
transaction_id = #{transactionId},
amount = #{amount},
dateline_create = #{datelineCreate},
dateline_end = #{datelineEnd},
status = #{status},
where id = #{id}
